import React from "react"; import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionItemHeading, AccordionItemButton, AccordionItemPanel, } from "react-accessible-accordion"; import "./forecast.css"; const WEEK_DAYS = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday']; const Forecast = ({ data }) => { const dayInAWeek = new Date().getDay(); const forecastDays = WEEK_DAYS.slice(dayInAWeek, WEEK_DAYS.length).concat(WEEK_DAYS.slice(0, dayInAWeek)); // Avoid mutating the original array by using slice to create a shallow copy const forecastData = data.list.slice(0, 7); return ( <> {forecastData.map((item, idx) => (
))} ); }; export default Forecast;
